Address 20Letter from the 
Managing Director
This sustainability report is produced in accordance 
with the Annual Accounts act and encompasses 
Tethys Oil AB (publ) and its subsidiaries. The board 
of directors and group management are responsible 
for the preparation of the report.Dear stakeholders,
2018 was a year of record financial results, 
continued reserve growth and operational 
and organisational progress for Tethys Oil. 
While I am proud of these results and 
achievements, I am even more proud in the 
knowledge that this was done in a sustain-
able and responsible way. Sustainability 
means running a business that is not only 
profitable but in tune with the require-
ments and expectations of stakeholders 
both within and outside the company.
Tethys Oil is in the oil and gas business 
and has as a stated objective to create 
shareholder value by operating across the 
entire upstream lifecycle. About a third of 
the world’s energy needs are satisfied by oil
